post:
I recently bought an OVH Kimsufi server deal that would fit my needs much better than what UrPad offers. Since I still have about 11 months on this plan, I'm hoping someone is willing to take over the account for **$18** which is pre-paid until Nov 21, 2013.

Plan details:
40 GB Disk Space
750 GB Bandwidth
100Mbit Port
1024 MB RAM Guaranteed
TUN/TAP Supported
RDNS Supported
1 IP Address

Location is Buffalo, NY.

Original offer thread: http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/6213/cyber-monday-urpad-21year-1.75m-vps-1gb-ram-40gb-hdd-750gb-bw-in-3-locations.-must-see

I accept Paypal or Interac email transfers if you are located in Canada!

Thanks!
